description:
Employment rate of persons aged 15 to under 65

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
Persons in employment as a percentage of the population. In
many cases, employment rates are shown only for persons of
working age (15 to under 65 years).


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Employment rate of persons aged 15 to under 65
